entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as being dead. The text does not provide any further information about James.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a young boy who has been left to live with Muggles after his father's death. He is described as being placed gently on the doorstep by Dumbledore.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is visibly upset about Harry's situation. He is comforted by Professor McGonagall and eventually leaves with Dumbledore to join celebrations.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are a group of people who will be taking care of Harry. They are mentioned as being the ones that Harry will live with after his father's death.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who tries to comfort Hagrid and eventually leaves with Dumbledore to join celebrations.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who places Harry gently on the doorstep, takes a letter out of his cloak, and then leaves with Hagrid and Professor McGonagall to join celebrations.
